channel.title: Drop Rates
channel.description:
Im in npcdrops.cfg and all I see is this: npcdrop = 1 1 6529 3 6529 4 6529 5 6529 6 6529 7 6529 8 6529 9 6529 10 6529 11 6529 12 6529 13 6529 14 6529 15 npcdrop = 2 ...... npcdrop = 3 ......
Where and how do I change the drop RATES?

item.title: Drop Rates
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

Don’t do it through npcdrops.cfg, it’s a waste of time and in most servers it doesn’t work. Theres a tutorial on this in the tutorial section that helps, its like “npc drops explained”. I think it’s that. Read it.

Read full topic

@Red_Tapuah wrote:

Not helps at all =\

I just wanna know how do I decrease the drop rates , you can get 2 GS from monsters in 5 minutes!!

Please help people are waiting , I wanna do this already!

item.title: Drop Rates
item.dc:creator: @fatwallet fatwallet
item.description:
@fatwallet wrote:

I’m not sure if theres a deffinate code, but in order is the drop rates: So like the first drop would be dropped say 25% more than the others, etc… Hope this helps!
